body_html:
@apaszke, could you tell me how to get access to the "next_functions" attribute? I get an attribute error telling me that Variable.creator does not exist. Could you explain me how to get a view of the function connectivity when computing the gradients?

I am currently getting the following error and I can't find a way of debugging it...

RuntimeError: No grad accumulator for a saved leaf!

Thanks

body:
@apaszke, could you tell me how to get access to the "next_functions" attribute? I get an attribute error telling me that Variable.creator does not exist. Could you explain me how to get a view of the function connectivity when computing the gradients?

I am currently getting the following error and I can't find a way of debugging it...

`RuntimeError: No grad accumulator for a saved leaf!`

Thanks
